attributes.action: order health warnings to be put on all containers of alcoholic drinks and fine landlords who knowingly serve alcohol to drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alcohol is a very poisonous Depressant.
It can and does cause mouth, throat and bowel cancers; it does no one ANY good whatsoever -it only does harm.
We need to change our attitude to its consumption as we have done with tobacco.
